article_title: Saint John back to single COVID-19 testing centre after 2nd site quietly closes
article_description: Saint John is back to a single COVID 19 testing centre after the Horizon Health Network closed two other locations in the past week  causing growing confusion and concern for some residents
article_content: Saint John is back to a single COVID 19 testing centre after the Horizon Health Network closed two other locations in the past week  causing growing confusion and concern for some residents The only assessment centre operating now is the one located at the    4723 chars
